text: Happy summer friday! Here’s what’s happening this weekend. EATING My 15 minute watermelon greek salad. And hot chicken salad! Also this grilled chicken cherry kale salad. DRINKING Fresh mint iced coffee!! And tequila grapefruit soda. MAKING My double chocolate zucchini muffins. Yes, yum. BAKING My peach cobbler granola. I crave this! I made my sour cream banana bread right before vacation too. GRILLING My chili lime chicken tacos! Also these garlic butter breadsticks. They are so easy and absolutely amazing. SNACKING Oh my hot honey chili crunch dip. It’s so good with pretzel crisps. CRAVING My strawberry shortcake trifle! Oh my gosh, what a dream. READING I have Sounds Like Love queued up and ready to go. Here is my big summer reading list! LISTENING To the perfect beach vibes playlist! WEARING This calia hi-waist sarong skirt is SO stretchy and comfortable. And just really easy on the beach! I’ve also been living in my 9seed tulum dress cover ups that I’ve had for years. I have tie dye ones, neon ones – I love them and they are excellent quality. BUYING These kids’ goggles right before we left for vacation, thank goodness. They are like a flat suction to the face and so great at keeping water out! SHOPPING For these things in my sephora cart: the fenty body lava, the ultra violette lip sunscreen, the YSL candy glow lavender lip balm and the one/size glass setting spray. LOVING This stainless steel snacklebox! Excellent option if you don’t want the all plastic one. Back to plastic though: the USA one is pretty adorable. SHARING My substack – Curated Cravings! If you love these summer fridays posts, my substack is full of things like this. Much more personal and fun. There are free and paid versions! It would mean so much to me if you’d subscribe. WORKING If you’re local to Pittsburgh, next Thursday I’m doing a super fun event at third space bakery!
html:
Happy summer friday! Here’s what’s happening this weekend.

EATING

My 15 minute watermelon greek salad. And hot chicken salad! Also this grilled chicken cherry kale salad.

DRINKING

Fresh mint iced coffee!! And tequila grapefruit soda.

MAKING

My double chocolate zucchini muffins. Yes, yum.

BAKING

My peach cobbler granola. I crave this! I made my sour cream banana bread right before vacation too.

GRILLING

My chili lime chicken tacos! Also these garlic butter breadsticks. They are so easy and absolutely amazing.

SNACKING

Oh my hot honey chili crunch dip. It’s so good with pretzel crisps.

CRAVING

My strawberry shortcake trifle! Oh my gosh, what a dream.

READING

I have Sounds Like Love queued up and ready to go. Here is my big summer reading list!

LISTENING

To the perfect beach vibes playlist!

WEARING

This calia hi-waist sarong skirt is SO stretchy and comfortable. And just really easy on the beach! I’ve also been living in my 9seed tulum dress cover ups that I’ve had for years. I have tie dye ones, neon ones – I love them and they are excellent quality.

BUYING

These kids’ goggles right before we left for vacation, thank goodness. They are like a flat suction to the face and so great at keeping water out!

SHOPPING

For these things in my sephora cart: the fenty body lava, the ultra violette lip sunscreen, the YSL candy glow lavender lip balm and the one/size glass setting spray.

LOVING

This stainless steel snacklebox! Excellent option if you don’t want the all plastic one. Back to plastic though: the USA one is pretty adorable.

SHARING

My substack – Curated Cravings! If you love these summer fridays posts, my substack is full of things like this. Much more personal and fun. There are free and paid versions! It would mean so much to me if you’d subscribe.

WORKING

If you’re local to Pittsburgh, next Thursday I’m doing a super fun event at third space bakery!
